concept.shortdesc: This paragraph mention about the introduction of gmail.

conbody.p:
Gmail is the email service provided by Google. As of 2019, it had1.5 billion active users worldwide making it the largest email service in the world. it provides a web browser and is accessible through the official mobile application. Google also supports the third-party email clients. we can install gmail application in
Windows
Android
IOS
